description.english: A lost raccoon, stranded in space, is now driving up rental prices.
A stylish, high-quality coffee machine designed to serve the finest coffee beverages to your crew.
A mysterious space jellyfish that can improve our energy system.
Fundamental Electrical Engineering Knowledge for Dummies
A pillow set filled with alien feathers, providing a comfortable and luxurious sleep experience.
Steel cage for catching ice blocks
Sanitary washing room to increase revenue from recyclable products.
A pet alien fish that increases the overall satisfaction of the crew, thus enabling more credits!
A cutting-edge mobile phone that greatly enhances the efficiency and satisfaction of the crew.
A futuristic concept car for space travel, with a lifetime battery.
A modern toilet for tranquil moments.
A collection of delicious, bite-sized cupcakes, perfect for celebrating birthdays or other special occasions.
A talking plant that can provide useful tips and enhances oxygen production.
A sticky, alien chewing gum.
A lavish, towering birthday cake adorned with colorful decorations and an assortment of delicious treats.
A powerful artifact known as the Philosopher's Stone.
A small, talking meteorite that has been separated from its family
An extraterrestrial fish that reproduces rapidly is somewhat small but should be edible.
A magical sparkling water tree that continuously provides high-quality sparkling water through its fruits.
A compact, high-tech component designed especially for filtering water from watermelons.
A chicken in a spacesuit that can lay nutritious blue eggs.
A less powerful version of the philosopher's stone, enhancing water production.
A wonderful pizza from the pizza tree!
A magical scepter given by the Rat King to control the rat infestation and increase food production.
A test tube of liquid tree that has a groundbreaking effect on food.
A wonderfully soft and gentle toilet paper, made for the most delicate of bottoms.
A highly-detailed blueprint for installing the mysterious alien component.
A luxury shower system designed for the ultimate in comfort and relaxation.
A luxurious set of bedding made from the softest and most comfortable alien feathers, providing a heavenly sleeping experience.
A painting made from leftovers. A reminder of a beautiful time when food didn't matter.
A cute hamster that constantly raises rents for animal lovers.
A state-of-the-art device designed to recycle organic waste into nutritious food for your crew.
An advanced water purification machine that makes water treatment more efficient.
A water-collecting transport box that continuously draws water from the ocean planet to the space base.
A futuristic electric car that permanently increases electricity production.
Machine for extracting oxygen from planetary gases.
A miraculous pizza tree that ensures a continuous supply of delicious pizza.
A compact, high-performance energy storage module designed to optimize power usage in your spaceship.
Promotional voucher for a new car on a business card made of fertilizer.
A mysterious solar wind turbine that got tangled in the command center's outer wall, giving us a permanent increase in energy production.
A special type of algae that significantly improves oxygen production.
A hamster in a wheel, increasing power production. Isn't he cute!
An electrically charged alien fish that powers the spaceship with energy.
Liquid plant for oxygen production.
Salami in Test Tube: A groundbreaking method for salami production that significantly increases food production.
A powerful electrically charged alien fish!
A small, comfortable nose mask designed to help reduce snoring and create oxygen
A state-of-the-art alarm clock that improves the crew's life by increasing punctuality and, in turn, boosting productivity.
A mysterious space cloud that provides a permanent increase in water production.
A unique substrate that promotes the growth of vegetables, increasing food production.
Color-Transparent Cloak: A cloak that provides perfect camouflage in any environment.
Shield Module: A portable protection module that generates a small, indestructible barrier to shield the bearer from attacks.
Sonar Pulse Generator: A device that emits strong sonar waves to stun enemies or detect hidden objects in the surroundings.
Trance Wave Generator: A device that emits hypnotic waves, putting enemies into a trance-like state and immobilizing them for a short time.
Thermo-Scanner: A scanner that displays thermal signatures underground, ideal for exploring tunnels and hidden objects.
Oasis Sprayer: A water sprayer that releases moisture and creates a mini-oasis, ideal for refreshment in hot environments.
Water Vortex Generator: A small device that generates water vortices and can be used to displace enemies and objects with a gentle pull from the desired position.
Spike Rain Projectile: A mini cannon that fires glowing spikes, creating a tingling explosion.
Lightspeed Wings: Specially designed wing attachments that grant the wearer extreme speed for a short time.
Virus Sabotage Device: A handheld device that releases small viruses to disrupt electronic systems and temporarily disable them.
Scale Light Emitter: A small light device that projects reflective scales, creating a dazzling effect – ideal for confusing opponents.
Camouflage Field Projector: A portable projector that creates an invisibility field, blending all objects and creatures within its radius perfectly with their surroundings.
Coral Shield: A portable shield generator that projects a shimmering coral weave, protecting the wearer from attacks.
Shadow Catcher Cloak: A cloak that absorbs light and grants the wearer the ability to hide in shadows and become nearly invisible.
Air Blade Projector: A projector that generates sharp air currents, slicing through the air like blades—ideal for removing obstacles or fending off enemies.
Technology hacking module: A module capable of manipulating and hacking simple systems.
Ghost Howl Hologram Projector: A portable projector that generates a wolf's howl and a layer of mist, scaring enemies.
Night Dust Projector: A device that emits hypnotic dust, putting enemies into a sleep-like state. Ideal for stealth missions!
Bergkruste-Brecher: A powerful drilling device that drills through hard rock layers and is essential for mining missions and cave explorations.
Cold Boots: Special boots that generate icicles with every jump, which can be used as steps. Ideal for icy environments and steep ascents.
Indestructible Armor Suit: A robust suit made of extremely durable materials that protects the wearer from physical damage.
Electric shock ring: A ring that delivers a mild electric shock to deter enemies.
Explosive Spike Launcher: A portable launcher that fires glowing spikes, which explode on impact and create a dazzling light show. Perfect for deterrence!
Cloaking Projector: A projector that creates a cloaking field, making the user invisible – ideal for espionage missions.
Voice Imitator: A handy device that perfectly imitates voices and sounds, causing confusion among enemies or can be used for communication.
Moonlight Vision Glasses: Glasses for night vision in the dark, ideal for nocturnal explorations.
Fog Generator: A generator that produces dense fog, serving as camouflage or restricting the vision of opponents—perfect for covert operations.
Spectral Fan Hologram: A holographic device that projects colorful patterns and psychedelic lights, creating a mesmerizing effect on everyone nearby.
Energy Claw Shocker: An electric glove that delivers a mild shock upon simple touch. Perfect for self-defense or minor repair work.
Ultrasonic Transmitter: A device that emits high-frequency sound waves to repel potential threats or send signals through water.
Gravity Meditation Field: A portable device that slightly reduces gravity in the surrounding area, making everyone feel more relaxed and weightless – perfect for meditation or a nap!
Air Bubble Transmitter: A transmitter that creates large, floating bubbles capable of safely and elegantly transporting small objects or living beings.
Earthbreaker Hammer: A heavy hammer that generates tremors and can break through ground.
Desert Whirl Generator: A portable device that creates small sandstorms, obscuring the vision of enemies. Ideal for dry and sandy environments.
Cloak-Jump Booster: A device that enables the wearer to become invisible for a short time and cover long distances with a quick leap.
Vibration Detector: A device for detecting underground movements and objects.
Armor Emitter: A device that generates a shimmering, protective shield that deflects attacks. Ideal for defensive missions.
Cozy Field Generator: A protective shield that absorbs light damage and provides calming effects.
Friendliness Wave Emitter: A portable device that emits a calming wave, causing enemies to react more peacefully and reduce aggression.
Camouflage Color Generator - A device that captures the surroundings and projects them onto its surfaces, making the wearer nearly invisible—perfect for espionage!
Earthquake Jump Boots: Special boots that create tremors upon landing.
Ice Glider Platform: A gliding board that reaches extreme speeds on ice surfaces – perfect for lightning-fast gliding.
Sound Shock Emitter: A compact device that emits powerful sound waves and repels enemies and obstacles within a small radius.
Bubble Regeneration Capsule: A regeneration chamber that envelops the user in healing bubbles, enabling immediate recovery from injuries.
Colony connection module: A small device that connects with similar devices nearby to form a network, enabling efficient resource distribution or data collection.
Bat Echo Scanner: A device that emits ultrasonic waves and reveals hidden objects.
Paralysis Gas Projector: A spray device that releases paralyzing gas to stun opponents.
Shadow Claw Gloves: Gloves with dark energy that make the wearer nearly invisible in shadowy environments and grant enhanced reflexes.
Venom Spike Shooter: A device that fires a small, poisonous spike and paralyzes the enemy. Ideal for self-defense!
Decomposition Bite Simulator - A device that 'decomposes' material through chemical substances, thereby creating passages or removing obstacles.
